name: hybridize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I ]
  biology
  specialized If two different types of plant or animal hybridize, they produce a new type of plant or animal: African and Asian elephant species do not hybridize in the wild. No numbers exist for how many animals or plants hybridize. Compare
crossbreed verb
[ T ]
  biology
  specialized to produce a new type of plant or animal from two different types of plant or animal: be hybridized with Bison have been hybridized in the past with cattle. He led groundbreaking experiments hybridizing oaks. Compare
crossbreed verb
[ T ] to produce something new from two other different things, that has features of both the things: He was eager to hybridize dance and the visual arts.be hybridized with Bookshops will become large, coffee-selling gathering spots, and will be hybridized with libraries.
